CustomField.description: To track the impact of LinkedIn on the Contact. New Contact means that the rep created a new Contact as a direct result of LinkedIn activities. Influenced Contact means that the Contact already existed in Salesforce, but the rep has engaged with them through LinkedIn. Case 26006237
CustomField.inlineHelpText: New Contact = a new Contact as a direct result of LinkedIn activities. Influenced Contact = the Contact already existed in Salesforce, but the rep has engaged with them through LinkedIn.
CustomField.label: LinkedIn Navigator
